data.text:
Good to have attended the Jupiter Roadshow today (this is not an advert for Jupiter btw üòÅ) and see some new faces as well as familiar ones and existing clients. As a business owner think it's always good to get out and make new connections, and moreso, to not go insane stuck inside the office all day. www.i-paraplan.co.uk #financialadviser #financialadvice #financialplanner #financialplanning #paraplanner #paraplanning

How are the latest developments in the space industry affecting your business? Hear from Christian Ford, our Space Exploration and Innovation Practice Chair, as he shares his insights on the key opportunities and challenges facing the space industry. You will also learn how our team can help you navigate the complex legal and regulatory issues that arise from operating in this dynamic field. Visit our website to access the first video in our Talking Space series: https://lnkd.in/gBxHzarQ #SpaceLaw #SpaceInnovation #SpaceBusiness

Post related to my previous ones: How to differentiate the cause of double-triggering in VC (VC-CMVs) just by observing the Pressure/Time waveform. The P observation does not imply that you don't have to use an "expiratory pause" maneuver, which is always recommended (by me). Feel free to say what you think about it.
